name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
It is reported that on August 5, netizens and Bilibili staged a fierce offensive and defensive battle.
This video was deleted frantically on Bilibili, but Bilibili netizens took turns to make up for it. At present, the speed of deleting videos is far behind the speed of netizens uploading.

content:

At noon on August 4, under the Beijing-Hong Kong-Macao Expressway Bridge in the jurisdiction of Matou Town, Zhuozhou City, the water depth was about 1 meter, and rescue workers found a victim.

content:

On August 5, the famous Bricklane graffiti wall in London was painted with “Socialist Core Values” and a question and answer was typed on “Rule of Law”.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Just now, the China Earthquake Networks Center determined that after a 5.5-magnitude earthquake occurred near Pingyuan County, Dezhou, Shandong

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, netizens in many places have felt the tremor

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
After the earthquake, Texas residents took shelter and chatted on the streets.
It seems that there is no serious problem at present, and the residents are in a stable mood.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The China Earthquake Networks Center officially determined that at 02:33 on August 6, a magnitude 5.5 earthquake occurred in Pingyuan County, Dezhou City, Shandong Province (37.16 degrees north latitude, 116.34 degrees east longitude), with a focal depth of 10 kilometers.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A Texas netizen took a photo of an ambulance on the street.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The disaster situation on the scene in Pingyuan County was reported online. The facades of buildings along the street collapsed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Zhuozhou netizens contributed
On August 5, some of the conditions at Zhuozhou No. 3 Middle School, which was used as a temporary resettlement site, were all people affected by the disaster nearby.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In the early morning of August 6, Gaobeidian, Hebei.
The government sent people to try to dig the 112 National Highway to discharge floodwaters without any flood discharge documents and approvals, but was discovered and stopped by local residents.
In the early morning of the 6th, because of the people's persistence, the government people finally left in dismay.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/GBQNLSlF7a

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It is reported that the mission was carried out by a steel plant in Liangjiaying, but the public obviously does not believe that a steel plant would dare to secretly dig a national highway to discharge floodwaters.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Incident correction
This group of people did not simply graffiti, but covered the graffiti on the original graffiti wall with white paint and then sprayed the core values on it. The question mark under "rule of law" is because they lost something during the graffiti process.
Currently, this incident has sparked widespread discussion on the Internet

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Guancha.com once again stressed that "the road is open, they don't run away"
But some local netizens said that many people did not evacuate because the higher-ups said it was raining instead of flood discharge when evacuating, so many people thought it was unnecessary to evacuate because of the rain.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some people at the scene began to fight back:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The group shared their graffiti process on Xiaohongshu

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
After leaving the moral condemnation and debate about the East London graffiti incident, I have to say that I think this work is very successful. It really makes people return to China in a second, just as its planner said.
This whole behavior is also a very vivid and "Chinese" artwork.
That is, when "China" comes, it will be rude, disrespectful and inconsiderate of others and clear away all the brilliant and colorful culture, leaving only the 24-character precepts with red words on a white background that they themselves cannot practice.
In fact, the current situation in China's cultural field is like this, step by step towards the abyss of boredom. I think anyone who works in the cultural industry in China should have a deep understanding of it.
Now, the unconscious behavior of patriotic artists has shown this cultural aesthetic to the world in a way that is not shameful.
This direct display of China's image is an effect that the Chinese government cannot achieve no matter how much money it spends on YouTube and Twitter.
Anyone who sees it will say thank you to the patriotic students.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Zhuozhou netizens contributed:

content:
Bazhou netizen submission
47 villages in Dongdian, Bazhou were flooded by the flood discharge. The government only asked people to evacuate but did not take any countermeasures. The victims suffered heavy losses.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
From secretly digging the river bank to the mayor's disappearance, from never admitting to releasing the flood to sending black-clad men to beat up the victims. 
Why did a flood sweeping across North China eventually turn into a battle to protect toys? I want to talk about what I saw from this flood.
